name: intellij-emberjs-import-support
description: Ember.js: support of `import from '@ember/..'` for JetBrains IDEs (Idea, WebStorm, ...)

scripts.postinstall: git clone --single-branch -b v3.6.1 https://github.com/emberjs/ember.js.git; mv ./ember.js/packages @ember-packages; rm -rf ./ember.js; find ./@ember-packages -name '*.d.ts' -exec rm {} +

author: Dmitriy Labuzov <arconamagi@gmail.com>
